sentences.en: A delivery date is stipulated in the contract.
sentences.cn: 合同中规定了交货日期。

sentences.en: Ensure all photographic material is properly packed and sent by recorded delivery.
sentences.cn: 确保把所有的摄影资料包装妥当并挂号寄出.

sentences.en: Free gifts are dispatched separately so please allow 28 days for delivery.
sentences.cn: 赠品会分开发送，所以请预留28天的送货期。

sentences.en: fresh milk deliveries
sentences.cn: 新鲜牛奶递送

sentences.en: He was employed at the local grocery store as a delivery boy.
sentences.cn: 他受雇于当地杂货店当送货员.

sentences.en: I asked them to speed the delivery up.
sentences.cn: 我请他们加快发货速度.

sentences.en: I had to give a slow delivery.
sentences.cn: 我不得不慢慢地说.

sentences.en: I'll charge myself with the safe delivery of the secret information.
sentences.cn: 我来负责安全递送这个秘密情报.

sentences.en: In the end, it was an easy delivery: a fine baby boy.
sentences.cn: 分娩过程最终非常顺利，生了个健康的男婴。

sentences.en: It is available at £108, including VAT and delivery.
sentences.cn: 其价格为108英镑，包括增值税和送货费在内。

sentences.en: Most Indian restaurants offer free delivery.
sentences.cn: 大多数印度餐馆提供免费外送服务。

sentences.en: Mrs Howell had an easy delivery.
sentences.cn: 豪厄尔太太的分娩很顺利。

sentences.en: Please take delivery of the goods at the station next Friday.
sentences.cn: 请于下星期五到火车站提货.

sentences.en: The doctor worked busily beneath the blinding lights of the delivery room.
sentences.cn: 这位医生在产房刺目的灯光下忙碌着。

sentences.en: The mother had an easy delivery.
sentences.cn: 母亲顺利生产.

sentences.en: They were due to pay the balance on delivery.
sentences.cn: 他们应该在货到时支付余额。

sentences.en: Use recorded delivery for large cheques or money orders.
sentences.cn: 对于大额的支票和汇款单要使用挂号邮寄。

sentences.en: we took delivery of the software in February.
sentences.cn: 我们在2月收到了所购软件。

sentences.en: You can expect delivery in a week to ten days.
sentences.cn: 你可以在一周至十天内收到货物。

sentences.en: You have to pay a premium for express delivery.
sentences.cn: 寄快速投递你得付额外费用.

words.tran_cn: 可以传送的；可交付使用的
交付；发表；递送；释放；给予（打击）；给…接生

phrases.tran_cn: 传送系统；运载系统；分配系统

trans.tran_cn: 递送（商品），分娩，投递的，演说风格
trans.tran_en: the act of bringing goods, letters etc to a particular person or place, or the things that are brought
